detaileddescription.para: Reads a BED file and extracts all pieces of info. Uses substr_line_from_bed() to extract info from each line.

parameterdescription.para: Path to the BED file.

parameterdescription.para: The line from which info must be extracted.
The delimiter between fields.

simplesect.para: : the four fields under a Bed_line structure.

detaileddescription.para: Extracts info from line.

parameterdescription.para: Line from which info must be extracted.
nb_elements to extract.
The delimitor between fields.

detaileddescription.para: Creates a vector, for which each field corresponds to one line of the input file.

parameterdescription.para: Path to the input file.

simplesect.para: : vector of one string per line.

detaileddescription.para: Returns a subselection of the input vector.

parameterdescription.para: The input vector (of strings).
The nb of elements to be extracted.

memberdef.name: random_sample_from_weighted_string_vector

parameterdescription.para: The input vector (of strings).
THe weight associated to each element in vec_strings.
The nb of elements to be extracted.

simplesect.para: : A random sample vector (taking into account the given weights)

detaileddescription.para: Returns a vector of pairs containing the string (as key) and the counts (as values).

parameterdescription.para: The initial vector of elements.

detaileddescription.para: Returns a Param_settings structure of the list of parameters.

parameterdescription.para: The string containing all parameters to read.
The delimitor between parameters.

simplesect.para: : A structure Param_settings containing all parameter settings.

memberdef.argsstring: (string file_parameters, set< string > &set_hotspot_instances, string path_to_data, string delim, bool verbose)
memberdef.name: get_parameters

detaileddescription.para: Gets all parameters from file and puts them in hash tables.

parameterdescription.para: Path to the file containing all parameters
Set of the names of all hotstpot instances. Passed by reference.
Path to the name of the folder "Data".
The delimitor between parameters.

simplesect.para:
: A strucutre of type List Hash containing three hash tables:
hash_param_settings: HASH (paramID > Param_settings)
hash_param_COs: HASH (paramID > CounterMap_COs)
hash_param_NCOs: HASH (paramID > CounterMap_NCOs)

memberdef.argsstring: (StringVector &list_hotspots, vector< double > &list_weights, string file_name, string delim)
memberdef.name: modify_weight_vector_from_file

detaileddescription.para: Modifies both a vector of list of hotspots (generally empty) and a vector of list of weights (generally empty) given in parameters.

parameterdescription.para: A vector of list of hotspots (generally empty). Passed by reference (to be created).
A vector of list of weights (generally empty). Passed by reference (to be created).
The name of the file (that must contain one column for the name of the hotspot, and one column for the intensity).
The delimitor between fields in the file.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned int CO_nb, unsigned int NCO_nb, string hotspot_selection_method, string path_to_data)
memberdef.name: select_hotspots

detaileddescription.para: Returns a vector of 2 vectors containing the list of hotspots for COs and NCOs.

parameterdescription.para: The number of COs required.
The number of NCOs required.
The method for the selection of hotspots.
Path to the name of the folder "Data".
Whether or not things should be printed.

simplesect.para:
: A vector containing 2 vectors:
vec_hotspot_ID_COs: The vector of all hotspot IDs for COs.
vec_hotspot_ID_NCOs: The vector of all hotspot IDs for NCOs.
